import {Entity, model} from '@loopback/repository';

    @model({
      name: 'Product',
      properties: {
        thePK: {type: 'number', id: true},
        name: {type: 'string', required: true},
      },
    })
    export class Decoratordefined extends Entity {
      thePK: number;
      name: string;

      constructor(data?: Partial<Decoratordefined>) {
        super(data);
      }
    }
